meanings.definition: The quality of being splendid or magnificent in appearance.
meanings.sent1: The resplendence of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The ballroom was filled with resplendence, with chandeliers sparkling and elegant decorations everywhere.
meanings.sent3: The resplendence of the peacock's feathers made all the other birds jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her resplendence on the red carpet outshone all the other celebrities.
meanings.sent5: The resplendence of the Taj Mahal at sunrise took my breath away.

meanings.definition: A brilliant or dazzling display of light or color.
meanings.sent1: The resplendence of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The resplendence of the gemstones in the jewelry store was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The resplendence of the disco ball made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The resplendence of the rainbow after the storm brought hope to the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The resplendence of the Christmas lights on the house attracted many visitors.
